name: Spellbound
description:
Back of Case - Nintendo DS (UK) (from Ad Blurbs)

Ready, Set, Spell!

How good is your spelling? Spellbound is an exciting and enjoyable game for the whole family revolving around a series of spelling based challenges. Compete in 11 different spelling and word games including Spelling Bee, Odd One Out, Fifty Fifty and many more. Advance to different levels as your spelling improves and test yourself in quick play modes. If that's not enough, you can also learn words in 5 different languages!
  • Be challenged by more than 25,000 spelling words
  • 11 challenging word games
  • Test your spelling in quick play mode
  • Choose from 100 difficulty levels
  • Learn more words in 5 languages
